solution_line_template: The factory creates {gummy_bears_per_minute} gummy bears a minute, which means it produces {gummy_bears_per_minute} / {gummy_bears_per_packet} = <<{gummy_bears_per_minute}/{gummy_bears_per_packet}={packets_per_minute}>>{packets_per_minute} packets of gummy bears per minute.

It would take {target_packets} / {packets_per_minute} = <<{target_packets}/{packets_per_minute}={time_in_minutes}>>{time_in_minutes} minutes to manufacture enough gummy bears to fill {target_packets} packets.
